search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Ghost (ghost.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Ghost can be found at: [https://ghost.org/pricing/](https://ghost.org/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:
Ghost(Pro) - Official managed hosting for Ghost
===============

==============================

Publishing, newsletters, members, payments — all in one place.

Based on an audience up to

USD / mo

USD / mo

Billed yearly

#### Features

Feature comparison
------------------

Plan 

### Product

Starter

Creator

Team

Business

Feature comparison
| Feature | Starter plan | Creator plan | Team plan | Business plan |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Members[](javascript:; "Help")
Members
=======

Members are any users who have either a free or paid account on your site with which they can subscribe or log-in, using Ghost's memberships & subscriptions feature.

As your publication grows over time you'll be notified to upgrade your plan whenever needed, based on the number of members you have.







 | 500 | 1,000 | 1,000 | 10,000 |
| Staff users[](javascript:; "Help")

Staff users
===========

Staff users are people who can log into Ghost Admin and publish posts, which includes **Author**, **Editor**, **Administrator** and **Owner** roles.

**Contributors** and Suspended users are always free, they won't count towards your plan limits.







 | 1 | 2 | 5 | Unlimited |
| Newsletters[](javascript:; "Help")

Newsletters
===========

Multiple newsletters in Ghost allow you to create more than one newsletter, each with its own subscriptions and design settings. This allows you to give your audience the option of what content they’d like to subscribe to.







 | 1 | 3 | 10 | Unlimited |
| Premium tiers[](javascript:; "Help")

Premium tiers
=============

Ghost allows you to offer multiple membership products, each with unique prices, benefits, and content access levels. A tiered pricing strategy makes it possible to grow your business by offering different products and benefits to your audience.







 | 1 | 5 | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Transaction fees[](javascript:; "Help")

Transaction fees
================

Ghost does not take a transaction fee, commission, or cut of your payments. All revenue that you generate is paid directly to you, from Stripe.







 | 0% | 0% | 0% | 0% |
| File uploads[](javascript:; "Help")

File upload limits
==================

You can upload unlimited files to each Ghost(Pro) plan. The file upload limit applies to how large each individual file can be, whether image, audio, video, pdf, or other upload.

If you need to upload files larger than supported by any of our plans, we recommend using a separate, dedicated service optimised for serving large media, like YouTube or Dropbox.

File uploads are subject to our [Fair Use Policy](https://ghost.org/fair-use/).







 | 5mb | 100mb | 250mb | 1gb |
| Custom domain[](javascript:; "Help")

Custom domains
==============

All **Ghost(Pro)** sites come with a free `ghost.io` subdomain by default, and also support the use of any custom domain name via a CNAME DNS record.







 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom sending domain[](javascript:; "Help")

Custom sending domain
=====================

Our Starter plan can send newsletters from a ghost.io email address. All higher plans can setup a custom sending domain to send newsletters from an email address branded the same as site's domain.







 | No | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom themes[](javascript:; "Help")

Custom themes
=============

Our Starter plan comes with a selection of official Ghost themes. If you want to build and use a custom or premium theme, this can be done on any of our higher plans.







 | No | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom integrations[](javascript:; "Help")

Custom integrations
===================

Our Starter plan comes with free integrations including Slack, Unsplash, FirstPromoter and Google AMP. Our higher plans also include advanced integrations that require custom theme code or API keys, like Zapier and GitHub.







 | No | Yes | Yes | Yes |

### Platform

Platform comparison
| Feature | Starter plan | Creator plan | Team plan | Business plan |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Fully managed service | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Automatic weekly updates | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Worldwide CDN | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Enterprise-grade security[](javascript:; "Help")
Enterprise-grade security
=========================

All **Ghost(Pro)** installs are integrated with **[Fastly](https://www.fastly.com/)**, with 24/7 DDoS mitigation, a sophisticated Web Application Firewall, brute force protection and automatic rate limiting.







 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Threat & uptime management[](javascript:; "Help")

Threat & uptime management
==========================

When you're under attack or the servers catch fire, if you self-host then you're the one who loses sleep. With **Ghost(Pro)**, we lose sleep!







 | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Free SSL certificate | Yes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom SSL certificate | No | No | \+ $20/mo | Yes |
| Custom subdirectory install[](javascript:; "Help")

Managed Subdirectory Install
============================

All **Ghost(Pro)** sites can be configured to run on a root domain, like `example.com`, or on a subdomain, like `blog.example.com`, using a standard CNAME record.

It's also possible to run sites on a subdirectory, like `example.com/blog`, however this requires customers to run their own **self-hosted reverse proxy** with a custom configuration. Supporting this setup is non-trivial, and is a **$50/month** addon only available on our **Ghost(Pro) Business** plan.

We only recommend this setup for teams who are very comfortable with complex technical infrastructure and are willing to put in the time and resources needed to maintain it.







 | No | No | No | \+ $50/mo |

### Support

Support comparison
| Feature | Starter plan | Creator plan | Team plan | Business plan |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Product help | Email support | Email support | Priority support | Account manager |
| Uptime SLA | No | No | No | 99.9% uptime SLA |

Launch your site
----------------

Last week, 5,069 brand new  
publications got started with Ghost.

Today, it's your turn.

[Start a free trial now →](https://account.ghost.org/signup/)
